text: Dogfight is a 1991 American Vietnam War comedy-drama movie directed by Nancy Savoca and starring River Phoenix, Lili Taylor, Brendan Fraser, E.G. Daily, Mitchell Whitfield, Holly Near. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * *Dogfight at Allmovie Category:1991 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s war movies Category:American war movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in Vietnam Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies directed by Nancy Savoca Category:Movies adapted into plays Category:1990s American drama movies
title: Dogfight (movie)
